name: Color Absorber
description:
Absorb Red, Green, & Blue to make Colors

Check out the "How to Play" to learn how to play.

"Norm" means "Normal"

Keyboard Shortcuts: "R", "G", "B" Respectively to Absorb Red, Green, or Blue -- Use with "Shift" to Unabsorb. "Shift + M" for Menu. In Menu "N" for Normal Level, "H" for Hard, "R" for Rage, & "T" for How to Play.

Credits: Unity, C#, Visual Studio Code, Musenet,  Advanced Game Sounds, & Photoshop
